meanings.definition: A game played with five small objects, originally the knucklebones of a sheep, that are thrown into the air and then picked up in various ways.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children enjoyed playing knucklebones in the schoolyard.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother used to tell me stories about how she played knucklebones with her friends when she was young.
meanings.sent3: The knucklebones game became so intense that they had to create a tournament to determine the champion.
meanings.sent4: Her skill in knucklebones was like a magician's sleight of hand, mesmerizing everyone who watched.
meanings.sent5: The sound of knucklebones hitting the ground echoed through the park, drawing a crowd of curious onlookers.

meanings.definition: A small smooth-surfaced bone forming part of a joint at the base of a finger.
meanings.sent1: She winced as the doctor examined her injured knucklebones after the fall.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully sketched the intricate details of the knucklebones in the hand drawing.
meanings.sent3: In the X-ray, the doctor pointed out the tiny fracture in the knucklebones, explaining the need for a cast.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate fingers moved gracefully, showcasing the elegant shape of the knucklebones.
meanings.sent5: The knucklebones in the anatomy model helped the students understand the structure of the hand better.
